//: scripts js Ã  lancer avec la commande 'npm run ...' ou via le 'task runner' de VScode pour automatiser les build et les deploiements
name: automation-studiojekyll
title: Automation Studiojekyll

scripts.clean:jekyll: bundle exec jekyll clean && rimraf _site_ready2deploy && rimraf docs
scripts.prelivebuild:jekyll: bundle exec jekyll clean && md _site && ping -n 3 127.0.0.1 > nul
scripts.prebuild:step0: bundle exec jekyll clean && rimraf _site_ready2deploy && rimraf docs
scripts.version-patch++: npm version patch && git push origin --tags && npm run createversionfile
scripts.version-minor++: npm version minor && git push origin --tags && npm run createversionfile
scripts.version-major++: npm version major && git push origin --tags && npm run createversionfile
